ComicInfo.Summary:
Part two of the Battle Void arc! ZIM and Dib are stranded on the same planet, but while Dib joins up with the local resistance (A.K.A. LOSERS) ZIM decides to battle his way up the ranks of the planet's gladiatorial system in hopes of getting to the world's extremely mysterious leader who does extremely mysterious stuff! THAT ZIM IS GONNA FIND OUT ABOUT!!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Maddie C. (a) & Fred C. Stresing (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Jess Marfisi | 2 |

ComicInfo.Characters: Dib Membrane, GIR, Recap Kid, Zim
